Hello, my name is Nicholas Kilkenny and welcome to my website!

Nicholas prefers to be called Nick and is a life long resident on the Philadelphia area. He works as a psychometrician and Thomas Jefferson University Hospital, and graduated from Drexel University with a degree in Psychology. He is currently attending the University of Pennsylvania to acquire his masters degree. After completing this he plans on going to continue his education in puruit of a doctorate in Clinical Psychology.  Outside of school Nick enjoy to go fishing, specifically in fresh water along with playing Xbox. Before all of this Nick was from the Philadelphia area suburb of Collegeville, and has not left the metropolitan area since he was born.
